languages.text: "Боги Хаоса — враги Империума, а значит, и мои. Можешь не сомневаться в этом".
"The Chaos Gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."
languages.original_text: "Боги Хаоса — враги Империума, а значит, и мои. Можешь не сомневаться в этом".

traits.locale_text: "Chaos gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."

languages.text: “混沌诸神是帝国的敌人，这意味着他们也是我的敌人。这一点你大可以放心。”
languages.original_text: "The Chaos Gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: “混沌诸神是帝国的敌人，这意味着他们也是我的敌人。这一点你大可以放心。”

languages.text: «Los Dioses del Caos son los enemigos del Imperium y, por lo tanto, también los míos. De eso puede estar segura».
languages.original_text: "The Chaos Gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: «Los Dioses del Caos son los enemigos del Imperium y, por lo tanto, también los míos. De eso puede estar segura».

languages.text: 「渾沌の神々は帝国の敵、つまり{mf|俺|私}の敵というわけだ。それは確実だ」
languages.original_text: "The Chaos Gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の神々は帝国の敵、つまり{mf|俺|私}の敵というわけだ。それは確実だ」

languages.text: "Die Chaos-Götter sind die Feinde des Imperium und damit auch meine Feinde. Darauf könnt Ihr Euch verlassen."
languages.original_text: "The Chaos Gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: "Die Chaos-Götter sind die Feinde des Imperium und damit auch meine Feinde. Darauf könnt Ihr Euch verlassen."

languages.text: « Les dieux du Chaos sont les ennemis de l'Imperium, ce qui veut dire qu'ils sont mes ennemis. Vous n'avez pas à en douter. »
languages.original_text: "The Chaos Gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."

traits.locale_text: « Les dieux du Chaos sont les ennemis de l'Imperium, ce qui veut dire qu'ils sont mes ennemis. Vous n'avez pas à en douter. »

languages.text: "Kaos Tanrıları, İmparatorluk'un düşmanlarıdır. İmparatorluk'un düşmanı benim de düşmanımdır. Bundan şüphen olmasın."
languages.original_text: "The Chaos Gods are the enemies of the Imperium, which means they are my enemies. You can be sure of that."
